title: teams unblanced in ranked
body: why is the teams in a ranked games so unbalanced atm? im far from a great player in b5, b4 then b3 then back to b5, b4 etc etc and have played over 400 games this season alone, so i think i know what im talking about when i day the ranked teams are unbalanced now. teams walk over us or we flog the other team, is this i sign of league losing its flavor for people to play league anymore ? may be its smerfs boosting mates accounts for the end of year skin,banner? i recon its the later but nothing will be done about this as per usual
